packageDescription: SimpleSalesforceConnect is a .NET Core class library that can be used to connect to Salesforce to obtain the Access Token and Instance Url to integrate your application with Salesforce and make API calls for CRUD operations. Wrappers are added to download Salesforce logs and then upload logs to Amazon S3 bucket.
